text: Hey <@UDJATA926> did you find a solution for your problem. I'm facing the same one
can you put the whole JSON payload you used for the API create property call here?

Can you manually associate contacts with companies through an API? I referenced this support article: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/How-do-I-associate-a-company-with-a-contact-using-the-API/td-p/238588>

I'm not seeing a property in my portal called associatedcompanyid
